mapper.sql: id, user_id, tno, `name`, gender, age, college, title, phone
mapper.select: select * from teachers WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
SELECT name FROM teachers WHERE tno = #{account}
SELECT phone FROM teachers WHERE name = #{publicName}
mapper.insert: insert into teachers (user_id, tno, `name`, gender, age, college, title, phone) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tno,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update teachers
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tno = #{tno,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
